advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Unleash Your Musical Talent with Smule - The Original Karaoke App!
Sing over 10 million of your favorite songs with music and scrolling lyrics. Enjoy karaoke for free anytime, anywhere! Join Smuleâ€™s global music community, where you can record solos, duets, and group performances - with or without video. Elevate your singing with professional voice effects and share your creations with millions worldwide.
Unleash Your Inner Star: Explore a vast library across genres like pop, rock, R&B, country, K-pop, and more. From chart-topping hits to classics, Smule has something for everyone. Stay on pitch with real-time scrolling lyrics and our pitch guide for flawless performances.
Collaborate with Top Artists: Experience the thrill of singing alongside top artists in recorded duets. Smule offers unique opportunities to collaborate with popular musicians, allowing you to feel like a star.
Key Features:
Sing Anytime, Anywhere: Access over 10 million karaoke songs with scrolling lyrics. Enjoy a massive catalog of songs!
Record & Share: Capture your singing in solo, duet, or group performances, and share your creations with the Smule community.
Duet with Top Artists: Sing alongside popular artists like Ed Sheeran, Olivia Rodrigo, Dua Lipa, classic Disney characters, and more! Smule lets you perform duets with recordings of top names in music, making you feel like a star.
Professional Vocal Recording: Use professional-grade vocal recording tools with reverb and voice tune.
Music Video Creator: Create music videos with a karaoke mixer and add vocal effects that elevate your performances.
Live Global Performances: Go live and shine! Host or join live karaoke parties with the Sing Live feature, giving real-time performances 24/7 with friends and music lovers worldwide! Share your talent live, gain fans, receive feedback, and perform for an interactive audience.
Learn and Improve: Access vocal lessons, practice with our pitch guide, and track your progress.
Join Exciting Challenges: Participate in regular karaoke contests and events to showcase your talent and win rewards.
Create and Customize: Transform your voice with professional-grade effects like reverb, AI powered tools, and more. Use our music studio features to mix and edit your recordings, add video filters, and create captivating music videos.
Connecting the World Through Musicâ„¢: At Smule, we believe music is a universal language that brings people together. Join our diverse community of music lovers from the UK and around the world, and share in the joy of creating and experiencing music together.
Download Smule Today and Start Your Musical Journey! Whether you dream of performing on a big stage or just love singing along to your favorite tunes, Smule is your ticket to a world of music, creativity, and connection. Sing, record, and share your voice today, and discover endless possibilities with Smule.
SUBSCRIPTION OPTIONS
- Subscribe for unlimited access to our full karaoke song catalog and sing karaoke solos, duets, group songs and a cappella for the duration of your subscription
- Subscriptions are weekly, monthly and annual*
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period
- Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription
- You can read our privacy policy at www.smule.com/privacy
*Price are equal to the value that "Apple's App Store Matrix" determines is the equivalent of the subscription price in $USD
https://www.smule.com/termsofservice
